AboutChemical.heading: Chemical Industry in India: A Digital Transformation Journey
AboutChemical.description: India is a prominent player in the global chemical sector, ranking as the seventh-largest producer of chemicals worldwide and the third-largest producer in Asia. The country stands fourth globally in agrochemical production, contributing significantly to the global market. India's chemical industry spans over 70,000 commercial products, including basic chemicals and their related products, such as petrochemicals, fertilizers, paints, varnishes, pharmaceuticals, and more. The sector plays a vital role in the Indian economy, being one of the most diversified industrial sectors.
